Name: Cast Iron Sluice/Slide Gate
Application: These are vertically sliding gates used for isolation / control of water flowing in and out of a closed conduit / orifice for seating and / or unseating water head application.
Sizes: From 100 x 100 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.

Application: These are vertically sliding gates used for isolation / control of water flowing in and out of a closed conduit / orifice for seating and / or unseating water head application.
Sizes: From 100 x 100 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.

Application: These are vertically sliding gates used for isolation / control of water flowing in and out of a closed conduit / orifice for seating and / or unseating water head application.

Name: FRP wall mounted gates
Application: These are vertically sliding gates used for isolation / control of water flowing in and out of a closed conduit / orifice for seating and / or unseating water head application.

Name: Cast Iron Open Channel Gates
Application: These gates are embedded / wall mounted / fixed in between two parallel walls of an open channel or mounted at the end of an open channel to isolate flow within as well as out of an open channel. These are suitable for seating / unseating water head up to the height of shutter / gate / disc.
Sizes: From 150 x 150 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.

Name: Stainless Steel Channel Gates
Application: These gates are embedded / wall mounted / fixed in between two parallel walls of an open channel or mounted at the end of an open channel to isolate flow within as well as out of an open channel. These are suitable for seating / unseating water head up to the height of shutter / gate / disc.
Mounting: Wall mounted / Channel mounted / Channel embedded.
Sizes: From 150 x 150 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.

Name: Aluminium Open Channel Gates
Application: These are vertically sliding gates used for isolation / control of water flowing in and out of a closed conduit / orifice for seating and / or unseating water head application.
Sizes: From 150 x 150 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.

Name: HDPE Open Channel Gates
Application: These are vertically sliding gates used for isolation / control of water flowing in and out of a closed conduit / orifice for seating and / or unseating water head application.
Sizes: From 150 x 150 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.

Name: FRP Open Channel Gates
Application: For isolation of flow within an open channel. Jash offers these gates completely made from Fiber Reinforced Plastic (FRP) without any carbon steel internal reinforcements which eliminates the two different co-efficient of thermal expansion of these different materials. These gates are good for corrosive environment / seawater application.
Mounting: Wall mounted / Channel Mounted / Channel embedded.
Sizes: From 150 x 150 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.
Water: Up to door depth seating / unseating

Name: Stainless Steel Weir Gates
Application: These are downward opening type gates and can be used either for Decanting of a reservoir or a tank, or For maintaining precise level control in a reservoir or a tank.
Sizes: Up to 2000 x 3000 mm.
Water: Up to the top of shutter / door.

Name: Aluminium Weir Gates
Application: These are downward opening type gates and can be used either for Decanting of a reservoir or a tank, or For maintaining precise level control in a reservoir or a tank.
Sizes: Up to 2000 x 3000 mm.
Water: Up to the top of shutter / door.

Name: FRP Weir Gates
Application: These are downward opening type gates and can be used either for Decanting of a reservoir or a tank, or For maintaining precise level control in a reservoir or a tank.
Sizes: Up to 2000 x 3000 mm.

Name: Cast Iron Flap Gates/Valves
Application: These are used for automatic drainage from outfall structures to rivers, estuaries and sea. These are also used for preventing reverse flow during flood from rivers /estuaries and high tide from sea. These can be offered in single or multi door design depending upon size.
Sizes: From 150 x 150 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.

Name: Stainless Steel Flap Gates/Valves
Application: These are used for automatic drainage from outfall structures to rivers, estuaries and sea. These are also used for preventing reverse flow during flood from rivers /estuaries and high tide from sea. These can be offered in single or multi door design depending upon size.
Mounting: Wall mounted / Channel Mounted / Channel embedded.
Sizes: From 150 x 150 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.

Application: These are used for automatic drainage from outfall structures to rivers, estuaries and sea. These are also used for preventing reverse flow during flood from rivers /estuaries and high tide from sea. These can be offered in single or multi door design depending upon size.
Sizes: From 150 x 150 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.

Name: Aluminium Extruded Stop Logs
Application: Stop logs are used for isolation duties in open channel. Stoplogs can be of single piece stacked together to achieve the desired total height.
Mounting: Wall mounted / Channel mounted / Channel embedded.
Sizes: From 150 x 150 mm up to 2000 x 3000 mm.
Water: Up to logs stacked height seating / unseating.
